sentences.sContent: Things are not yet carried to that extent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Things are not yet carried to that extent.
sentences.sCn: 事情还没有发展到那种程度。

sentences.sContent: When the smoke blew away, we could see the extent of the damage.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the smoke blew away, we could see the extent of the damage.
sentences.sCn: 浓烟消散后， 我们就能看清破坏的程度了。

sentences.sContent: The extent of human cooperation is unique, but not cooperation itself.
sentences.sContent_eng: The extent of human cooperation is unique, but not cooperation itself.
sentences.sCn: 人类的合作程度，而非合作本身，是独一无二的。

sentences.sContent: ...But renewable energy will have to displace fossil fuels to a much greater extent in the future to avoid unacceptable climate risks...
...A recent International Labor Organization report says the deterioration of real wages around the world calls into question the true extent of an economic recovery...
...One recent study attempted to calculate the extent of this "ecological overshoot of the human economy"...
...we judge the extent to which we are the same as or different from others...

phrases.pCn: 有几分，在某种程度上；在一定程度上
达到……的程度以致；就……来说；在这个意义上；在这样的范围内；在……方面来说
在一定程度上；到达…程度
最大限度地，到极点；极力地

remMethod.val: ex(出) ＋ tent(伸展) → 伸展出的距离 → 广度； 范围
